title: Bmunk Hospitality Pvt. Ltd. Privacy Policyyyyyyyyy
desc:
Bmunk Hospitality Pvt. Ltd. Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make a purchase from http://staybindass.com/ (the “Site”).

PERSONAL INFORMATION WE COLLECT

When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Additionally, as you browse the Site, we collect information about the individual web pages or products that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the Site, and information about how you interact with the Site. We refer to this automatically-collected information as “Device Information.”

We collect Device Information using the following technologies:

- “Cookies” are data files that are placed on your device or computer and often include an anonymous unique identifier. For more information about cookies, and how to disable cookies, visit http://www.allaboutcookies.org.

- “Log files” track actions occurring on the Site, and collect data including your IP address, browser type, Internet service provider, referring/exit pages, and date/time stamps.

- “Web beacons,” “tags,” and “pixels” are electronic files used to record information about how you browse the Site.

[[INSERT DESCRIPTIONS OF OTHER TYPES OF TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES USED]]

Additionally when you make a purchase or attempt to make a purchase through the Site, we collect certain information from you, including your name, billing address, shipping address, payment information (including credit card numbers [[INSERT ANY OTHER PAYMENT TYPES ACCEPTED]]), email address, and phone number. We refer to this information as “Order Information.”

[[INSERT ANY OTHER INFORMATION YOU COLLECT: OFFLINE DATA, PURCHASED MARKETING DATA/LISTS]]

When we talk about “Personal Information” in this Privacy Policy, we are talking both about Device Information and Order Information.

HOW DO WE USE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?

We use the Order Information that we collect generally to fulfill any orders placed through the Site (including processing your payment information, arranging for shipping, and providing you with invoices and/or order confirmations). Additionally, we use this Order Information to: Communicate with you;

Screen our orders for potential risk or fraud; and
When in line with the preferences you have shared with us, provide you with information or advertising relating to our products or services.
[[INSERT OTHER USES OF ORDER INFORMATION]] We use the Device Information that we collect to help us screen for potential risk and fraud (in particular, your IP address), and more generally to improve and optimize our Site (for example, by generating analytics about how our customers browse and interact with the Site, and to assess the success of our marketing and advertising campaigns).
[[INSERT OTHER USES OF DEVICE INFORMATION, INCLUDING: ADVERTISING/RETARGETING]]

SHARING YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION

We share your Personal Information with third parties to help us use your Personal Information, as described above. For example, we use Shopify to power our online store--you can read more about how Shopify uses your Personal Information here: https://www.shopify.com/legal/privacy. We also use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the Site--you can read more about how Google uses your Personal Information here: https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/. You can also opt-out of Google Analytics here: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.

Finally, we may also share your Personal Information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, to respond to a subpoena, search warrant or other lawful request for information we receive, or to otherwise protect our rights.
[[INCLUDE IF USING REMARKETING OR TARGETED ADVERTISING]]

BEHAVIOURAL ADVERTISING

As described above, we use your Personal Information to provide you with targeted advertisements or marketing communications we believe may be of interest to you. For more information about how targeted advertising works, you can visit the Network Advertising Initiative’s (“NAI”) educational page at http://www.networkadvertising.org/understanding-online-advertising/how-does-it-work.

You can opt out of targeted advertising by:

[[ INCLUDE OPT-OUT LINKS FROM WHICHEVER SERVICES BEING USED.
COMMON LINKS INCLUDE:
FACEBOOK - https://www.facebook.com/settings/?tab=ads
GOOGLE - https://www.google.com/settings/ads/anonymous
BING - https://advertise.bingads.microsoft.com/en-us/resources/policies/personalized-ads ]]

Additionally, you can opt out of some of these services by visiting the Digital Advertising Alliance’s opt-out portal at: http://optout.aboutads.info/.

DO NOT TRACK

Please note that we do not alter our Site’s data collection and use practices when we see a Do Not Track signal from your browser.

[[INCLUDE IF LOCATED IN OR IF STORE HAS CUSTOMERS IN EUROPE]]

YOUR RIGHTS

If you are a European resident, you have the right to access personal information we hold about you and to ask that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us through the contact information below.

Additionally, if you are a European resident we note that we are processing your information in order to fulfill contracts we might have with you (for example if you make an order through the Site), or otherwise to pursue our legitimate business interests listed above. Additionally, please note that your information will be transferred outside of Europe, including to Canada and the United States.

DATA RETENTION

When you place an order through the Site, we will maintain your Order Information for our records unless and until you ask us to delete this information.

[[INSERT IF AGE RESTRICTION IS REQUIRED]]

MINORS

The Site is not intended for individuals under the age of [[INSERT AGE]].

CHANGES

We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons.

CONTACT US

For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e-mail at nileshk@bmunk.com or by mail using the details provided below:

91 Spring boards Lotus, Plot No. D-5 Road No. 20, Marol MIDC, Andheri (East), Mumbai, Maharashtra 400069, Mumbai, MH, 400069, India

title: Terms & Conditions of the Services
desc:
Terms & Conditions of the Services

TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR RENTAL VILLAS AND SERVICE APARTMENTS

Staybindass is an online and offline platform for providing adequate rental properties. We not only provide Luxury Villas but also Bungalows, Cottages, Homestays, Bungalows, Service Apartments, Luxury Resorts, and Hotels for Corporate Booking, all this is managed under the brand name “Staybindass”.

These Terms and Conditions are applicable to all our Guests and customers who are booking the villas, service apartments, or any other properties through any of our online platforms like our website, our mobile application, third party website, or through offline platforms with the help of any third parties, advertisements, referrals, etc.

Please ensure that you read all these terms and conditions carefully and understand them before you book any of the villas, apartments, or any other properties through our booking platforms.

All these terms and conditions become applicable to the guests who make a booking from our booking platforms or any other booking platforms by the name of Staybindass.

These Terms and Conditions are subject to change anytime and Staybindass may change without any prior notice to you and also can revise them and any other information if required. Staybindass may also make improvements or changes in its services as required, without any prior notice. Therefore, you are advised to regularly check for any modification, redrafting, or updates to these Terms and Conditions. If the changes done by us are not acquiescent to you, you can stop using the channel for booking villas or apartments.

If these terms and conditions are not acceptable to you, please do not use our Booking platforms to make a Booking through Staybindass.

Basic Expression / Phrases

For booking through our online platforms as well as offline means, the terms used in these Terms and Conditions have the particular meaning as follows:

- “Staybindass” is a company that offers residential properties such as villas and service apartments for renting these properties for a short term stay for our Guests or Customers under the brand name Staybindass.

“Property or properties” means villas and service apartments that are hired by Staybindass from their owners, where Staybindass and owner have Assignor rights - relationship. It also includes the non-leased villas and service apartments which are taken by Staybindass on a short term basis.

“Guests” refers to You or the guests who make a Booking of the property through our Booking platforms.

“Online Booking platforms” include our website, our mobile application, third party website, etc.

“Offline Booking platforms” shall include third party referrals like travel agents, advertisements, etc.

“Booking” means renting property by Staybindass to our Guests for a short term stay for their vacations and holidays, etc.

"Check-In" is the date and time scheduled for the Guests from which they can start staying and using the property.

"Check-Out” is the date and time scheduled on which the duration of stay of Guests end and they will have to depart and cannot further have any allowance inside the property.

“Booking Period” is referred to the period which starts at scheduled Check-In and ends at scheduled Check-Out.

“Booking on Hold” means to hold on to the booking with pending dues, balance booking amount, and delayed in security deposit payment. Staybindass shall hold on to the booking status even if the Booking is confirmed and held for guests, Guests cannot use the Property unless he / she deposits the total Booking Amount by specified due dates.

“Booking Confirmation” means that the total amount of deposit due towards Booking Amount from Guests is completely paid and cleared, hence, Staybindass confirms that Guests can Check-In at the Property for the period of their stay in the Property. The On-receipt of the total amount should be sent to Staybindass to confirm your booking.

“Booking Offer” is an offer for Booking of Property offered by Staybindass to their Guests.

"Advance" is the non-refundable amount required to be deposited by Guests with Staybindass as an early deposit for securing a confirmed Booking of the Property. This non-refundable deposit amount is to secure your booking with a confirmation with Staybindass.

"Security Deposit" is the amount required to be paid before check-in to the property with Staybindass or the owner as the deposit amount in case of any damage caused by the Guests or their pets to the property, this amount is levied as a recovery charge for any particular damage happens.

“Peak Days” are the days that include all the festivals including long weekends and not limited to Diwali, Christmas, or New year's eve.

Eligibility

Persons who are ‘inadequate to contract' within the meaning of the Indian Contract Act, 1872 are not eligible to book any of our property. One who can legally bind with our terms and conditions and sign the contract with Staybindass can use and book the properties from our booking platforms.

Access and Interference for booking

Any failure to fall in with the terms, conditions and notices on this website will automatically terminate any rights granted to you, without prior notice. You should not mirror any of the content from this website on another site or in any other media. Make sure the information that you provide is free of any viruses that can cause the malfunctioning of the website.

Right of Admission and Access to the Property

For the hired Properties, Staybindass reserves complete and unconditional rights of admission to such Villas or service apartments, and in the case of non leased Properties owner and Staybindass, on behalf of the owner, jointly reserve the complete right of admission to the Properties.

The Guests are not allowed to check in the Property before they comply with all the requirements as formulated. In case the Guests fail to do so, no refund against deposits paid by Guests be claimable by the Guests or payable by Staybindass or owner to Guests or anyone else.

Cancellation of Booking on Hold

When the booking is in Hold status i.e if the payment is not done or the full amount is not received by Staybindass by the due dates, the booking shall be canceled, as per the standard cancellation policy of Staybindass.

If the amount is paid before or on the due date then the Hold status will be confirmed and you can Check-In easily on your arrival date.

Payment Options

The various modes of payment granted by Staybindass are as follows:

1. Credit Card/Debit Card: You have an option to pay by Visa, MasterCard, American Express credit cards, or debit cards. for card payments, you must have to share your card number, the expiry date, and the CVV number of the card.

2. By Cheque: You can make payment by cheque. Guests should agree that the payment by cheques shall be cleared before the Check-In date.

3. Net banking: You can also avail your bank's online banking services to make payments through online means.

Hope you agree with all the terms and conditions and can enjoy your vacation booking with Staybindass.

title: Refund & Cancellation Policy
desc:
Cancellation and Refund Policy

75% refund will be given if the booking is canceled 30 days before the check-in date

50% refund will be given if the booking is canceled 15 days before the check-in date

No refund will be given if the booking is canceled less than 15 days before the check-in date

*Please take note: A cancellation fee of 20% of the booking value shall be charged for all refunds processed by Staybindass. This is pertinent to cover all the payment gateway charges, convenience fees, and processing charges.

Cancellation/Refund Policy For Guests On Peak Dates

Our standard policy is not the same for cancellations made for peak dates.

The booking will be considered as canceled in full, in which case the booking value will be entirely non-refundable, irrespective of when the cancellation is being made.

If the booking amount has been partially paid, the cancellation will be considered non-refundable.
